title: Music Recommendations
body:
Any good music recommendations that are similar to the Jhin them? 
Instrumental
Theater-y

replies.body:
Hey Andrew,

I'm not sure there's anything quite like Jhin's theme out there. I *did* look for references, because I was interested in how people would mix solo violin, choir and really aggressive percussion together. 

That being said, you should check out music by Eric Whitacre, Ralph Vaughan Williams, Benjamin Britten, Arvo PÃ¤rt, etc.

Hope this helps!

Ed the Conqueror
